subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts in Rajasthan are associated with the Rana Kumbha?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन से भूमिकाएं सम्बंधित राणा कुम्भिकों के साथ हैं?
A_en: Amber Fort, Kumbhalgarh Fort, Mehrangarh Fort
A_hi: अमेरिक फोट, कुम्भलगार फोट, मेहरांगर फोट
B_en: Mehrangarh Fort, Kumbhalgarh Fort, Amer Fort
B_hi: मेहरांगर फोट, कुम्भलगार फोट, मेहरांगर फोट
C_en: Amber Fort, Kumbhalgarh Fort, Mehrangarh Fort
C_hi: अमेरांगर फोट, कुम्भलगार फोट, मेहरांगर फोट
D_en: Amber Fort, Mehrangarh Fort, Kumbhalgarh Fort
D_hi: अमेरांगर फोट, मेहरांगर फोट, कुम्भलगार फोट
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort, Kumbhalgarh Fort, Amber Fort are the famous forts in Rajasthan associated with Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: मेहरांगर फोट, कुम्भलगार फोट, अमेरांगर फोट
explanation: These forts were constructed by Rana Kumbha during his reign.
